title: Sessions Heralds `Trump's America' Immigration Policy (Audio)
itunes:title: Sessions Heralds `Trump's America' Immigration Policy (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Hans von Spakovsky, Manager of Election Law Reform Initiative at The Heritage Foundation, and Grisel Ruiz, an attorney at the immigrant legal resource center, discuss attorney general Jeff Sessions' recent statements about illegal immigrants in America, as well as California's attempts to become a so-called "sanctuary state" for immigrants. They speak with June Grasso and Michael Best on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
